body: This was pretty stupid and nonsensical. Also really unsatisfying.
Sorry, Captain. Every girl you have eyes on is not monogamous. Make yourself polyamourous to match them or keep searching.
I found this secret code from youtube, and I will never re read this h-manga again
Dude was a wimp. Sister is dumb and blonde girl is a straight up where. Nuff said

Well well, this is indeed sad tho. Agreed with @trigger down there, i mean the lil sis also saw his brother got into it like a monkey when she still think her brother isn't a lewd man like that bear. I think it makes her hope to him plummeted down, perhaps if he didn't get into it with that blondie, i think he would won over his lil sis. Also i don't think you can expect a girl to keep their promise if they're being left alone, especially when she was "bullied" like that, not every girl are strong minded, especially for someone who got "bullied", whoever save them would be the most probably one who get the cakes. Also, not to mention her brother neglecting her for 4 years, well. It's indeed saddening, but that bro got what he deserve in my opinion...

@Thot_Patrol Wrong actually, it's pretty obvious they already broke up (no need for words after the third affair part) which is why she told him there are a lot more girls out there. He's just treating her as a sex friend in the end. As for the sister part, the bear reflected and regretted on his action and took responsibility on it, which partly the reason why she got a new opinion of him and started to like him and partly (obviously) liked the sex with him and his giant dong. At least the brother finally got past his siscon phase. (plus or minus on the last part, depending on your fetish) IMO, kinda meh fap material and story(lol I know) overall and nothing to overreact about. Distance's art is still kinda rough and more based on older art style at this point of his mangaka career. That said though, kinda surprising some people still commenting about getting triggered/raging to this very old h-manga lol Well anyway, time to re-read some other old ones that I can still remember.

This was absolutely awful. No if ands or buts. Dudes sister gets fucked and taken away, and the chick he "ends up with" is an absolute whore. Why would he stay with a chick who fucks another dude in front of him nonchalantly. 0/10 Don't bother.

Its kinda fucked up, i mean, he couldn't keep his sister, since she loves de bear guy, and its not like he got a "happy" ending with the blonde girl, she's no angel, she fucked the bear guy, twice, she fucked another random guy in front of the mc, and she probably will fuck with other guy if she gets the chance. Also, Ryoko, the blonde girl, also fucked more people in "Buchou Yori Ai o Komete", from the same artist...
But yeah, thats ntr, so, we shouldn't complain about it.
I read a lot of NTR and people saying this is "sad", no this was just stupid
re-read this shit again, back then this shit makes me sad so much, i like NTR in general but not like this one. his magnum opus still anekomori.
distance really like fucked up stories -.- and i love few of them but i think this is so sad T.T
Pretty obvious his sister like huge cock and aggressive man

So What's up with the sister? She likes her brother yet chooses to stay with the bear guy for pretty much no reason besides that he's nice to her...everything else was was pretty good except for that.
